column1: wesley gordon benton| services for wesley gordon benton of ochlocknee will be at 11:30 on tuesday at little ochlocknee baptist church. the family will receive friends from 11 till service time on tuesday and on monday night from 6 to 7 at the funeral home. survivors include his wife
column2: sandra and two sons mark and bert. a complete notice will be published on monday. cemetery details. little ochlocknee baptist church cemetery7856 ga highway 188. ochlocknee
